QuestData.Title: A Leaking Box Marked Perishable
QuestData.Description: A very exact entity wanted this package to reach Ta'tru at the Night Market. It looks like Broker script. The package is clearly leaking, and it is marked perishable. Perhaps delivering it quickly would be best.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the package to the Night Market.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ta'tru at the Night Market.
QuestData.RewardText: Oooh, is that my package of flesh eating ooze! I hope you did not get any on your hands, oh a glove, specification of this specific ooze should mean you have only a 25% chance of an adverse effect. The glove should be burned but I will leave that to your discretion. I will inform the locals of your assistance in delivery, even if it was delayed.
